lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Cornelissen stressed that Royal Trust would shun direct competition with major global financial institutions in activities such as international lending and stock brokerage, in order to exploit "profitable niches" overseas in traditional trust activities such as asset management, private banking and advisory services.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Aiding Royal Trust's foreign growth are greater foreign investment interest in North America and increased Canadian investment abroad, Cornelissen said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Proposed government regulations to allow Canadian banks, trusts, insurance and securities dealers full participation in one another's actitivies will mean more domestic competition for Royal Trust, "but not drastically more," Cornelissen said.
